Chapter 4304 - Chapter 4304: 4303 Joined Forces

Chapter 4304: 4303 joined forces

Translator: 549690339

Wang Xian left the detection range of the old man in the bamboo hat. He squinted his eyes slightly and looked in that direction.

However, after hesitating for a moment, Wang Xian did not engage in a fight with the old man in the bamboo hat.

Even if he were to make a move now, it would be difficult for him to do anything to the old man!

There was no point in engaging in a fight with the old man!

Moreover, Wang Xian had no idea about the old man’s background at all!

With this thought in mind, he flew in another direction.

At the same time, Wang Xian was very curious about the special creature on the old man.

This creature had ten attributes and was able to enter the region of the cross-shaped primordial spirit.

This was an inspiration to Wang Xian.

This method was somewhat similar to the fishing method.

However, Wang Xian felt that this method might be more suitable for him.

After all, he had ten attributes at the moment.

If he were to create a living creature, he would definitely be able to create something even more powerful.

Putting everything else aside, he was still confident in the ruler realm.

And the ruler realm was something that the divine emperor realm could not compare to.

However, this kind of living creature is not something that I can create casually. After all, this is the aspect of creation. I need to master secret techniques or I need to continue researching

Wang Xian thought to himself and temporarily gave up on this idea.

He swept his gaze across the surroundings and continued to search the area.

However, if he were to search from the outside, it was purely a matter of luck!

Wang Xian’s luck could not always be very good.

This time, Wang Xian did not discover any treasures just from the outside.

I still have to go deep inside. For example, Sword Elder Song Ta and the rest should have fishing tools here. After all, this is the core area

Wang Xian thought to himself.

Currently, Wang Xian’s background here was considered the worst.

I still have to go in

Wang Xian moved his body and entered the cross-shaped primordial spirit area directly.

There was an energy camouflage around him.

Two minutes was not a short time for him, but it was definitely not a long time either.

Especially in this place where his movement speed was greatly reduced.

There were not many places that could be explored in two minutes.

Once it was more than two minutes, it would be dangerous.

As for the divination lamp, it was useless here.

If one wanted to divine the ten elemental gods of the Great Dao level, it was possible to exhaust all their energy in one second.

Wang Xian could only use such a stupid method to start the search.

At the very least, he needed to find some materials so that he could create his own fishing tool.

In that case, he could try fishing.

Although it was only two minutes, the other great dao level experts would probably only be able to stay in there for a few dozen seconds.

After entering the area of the cross primordial spirit, Wang Xian quickly looked around.

After a minute and a half, he came out immediately to prevent any accidents.

In the next few months, Wang Xian managed to find some special materials.

It was a material that was like a weed. There were ten kinds of energy attributes on it.

Wang Xian could use this material to create fishing lines.

“I might as well go to those ordinary areas of the Elemental God.”

A few months later, Wang Xian shook his head. He didn’t gain much.

This gave him the idea of leaving this place.

After all, obtaining treasures didn’t mean that he could only obtain them in the core.

It was easier to obtain treasures in a place that was more suitable for him.

“This won’t do. There’s a special vortex inside this place. It Won’t be able to last long if we rely on our strength.”

At the same time, they were at another location in the cross-shaped primordial spirit region.

Old Man Jian and song Ta were floating together.

They were staring at the location in front of them with their brows knitted tightly.

Both old man Jian and song Ta had stayed in this region for a very, very long time.

They also knew a lot about everything in the cross-shaped primordial spirit region.

It was completely incomparable to Wang Xian.

After they separated from Wang Xian, the two of them separated as well.

However, song TA had found this place not long ago. He discovered that there were a few pieces of the god of elements fragments as well as fire-type treasures inside.

However, there was a small whirlpool formed here. If he wanted to obtain these treasures, he had to enter the whirlpool!

Although this place wasn’t far from the safe zone outside, he couldn’t hold on for long due to the existence of this whirlpool.

Therefore, he called old man Jian over.

However, the result of the two of them working together was still unable to bring him up.

They would not be able to hold on for so long.

“I need to continue to look for helpers. Only by combining the powers of the two powerhouses on my body can I obtain those few treasures.”

Song Ta opened his mouth and said, “There are not many old fellows here. Moreover, our relationship with them is just average. Why don’t we look for that Wang Xian?”

“Him? Sure, his strength isn’t weak. However, we aren’t afraid of any accidents if we join forces. He should be around and can rush over quickly.”

The old man with the sword thought for a while and nodded his head in agreement.

“Alright!”

Song ta replied. Then, he took out his heaven origin communication device and sent a message to Wang Xian.

On the other side, Wang Xian, who was about to leave, suddenly received a message from song TA. He had a surprised expression on his face.

“Huh? Are you looking for me to join forces?”

When Wang Xian received this message, he also had a surprised expression on his face.

He was not familiar with the old man song Ta Jian.

Inviting him to join forces at this moment was obviously a problem that both of them could not solve.

Wang Xian did not hesitate. He replied a message directly and flew towards their location.

Since the other party was looking for him to join forces, he believed that they were extremely confident.

Since they were working together, they would gain something.

Wang Xian had stayed here for a period of time and did not gain anything. Now that there was an opportunity, he naturally went over to take a look.

Buzz

Two days later, Wang Xian arrived at the location where song Ta, old man Jian, and the rest were.

When he saw the two of them, Wang Xian’s eyes flickered slightly and he immediately approached them!

“Brother Wang Xian, sorry to disturb you!”

Song ta greeted Wang Xian with a smile when he saw him approaching!

“There’s no need to disturb me. It’s very beneficial for me to be called over by the two of you!”

Wang Xian smiled and replied!

“Since I’ve called you over, brother Wang Xian, I’m confident that I’ll be able to obtain the treasures in there with your help.”

Song ta said, he pointed to the bottom and said, “There is a special vortex there. In the center of this vortex, there are some fragments of the god of elements and treasures. If I were to join forces with old man sword, I wouldn’t be confident. If I were to join forces with you, brother Wang Xian, I would be confident!”

“Brother Wang Xian, you can go in and take a look. The treasures are those. When the time comes, we can distribute them!”

“Oh? Alright!”

When Wang Xian heard his words, he looked at the place he was pointing at and nodded.

Under song TA’s signal with a smile, Wang Xian moved his body and flew down.
